test: select TMID,Name from FX_Theme as test;
CompanyPropertyDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'companyType';
CountyAndStreetDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'countyAndStreet';
LitigantTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'litigantType';
CaseTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'caseTypeDic';
punishmentTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'punishmentTypeDic';
InvestigateTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'investigateTypeDic';
lawEnforcementTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'lawEnforcementTypeDic';
ajlyTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'ajlyTypeDic';
parentTypeDic: select ID as id, mc as mc from Para_BizTypeDictionary;
qdlxTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'qdlxTypeDic';
swrw: select 'COD' id,'COD' name union select 'BOD5' id,'BOD5' name union select 'SS' id,'SS' name union select 'NH3-N' id,'NH3-N' name;
qwrw: select 'eyhl' id,'二氧化硫' name union select 'yc' id,'烟尘' name union select 'fc' id,'粉尘' name union select 'dyhw' id,'氮氧化物' name;
gwrw: select 'fmh' id,'粉煤灰' name union select 'lz' id,'炉渣' name union select 'qt' id,'其他' name;
wxfw: select fwdm as id,wxfw as name from Para_DW_DangerWasteList;
fwlxTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'fwlxTypeDic';
mjTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'mjTypeDic';
gkcdTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'gkcdTypeDic';
gzsTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'gzsTypeDic';
occupationTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'occupationTypeDic';
positionTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'positionTypeDic';
yuanTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'yuanTypeDic';
zsTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'zsTypeDic';
areaDic: select qydm as id ,qymc as mc from Para_Region;
AttachmentType: select FileTypeId,FileTypeName from B_OA_FileType order by orderBy;
xfxzDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'xfxzDic';
xflyDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'xflyDic';
unitDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'unitDic';
goodsTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'goodsTypeDic';
institutionDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'institutionDic';
protectTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'protectTypeDic';
goodsStatusDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'goodsStatusDic';
logTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'logTypeDic';
buyMethodTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'buyMethodTypeDic';
storagePlaceDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'storagePlaceDic';
quitMethodDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'quitMethodDic';
kyfwrlxDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'kyfwrlxDic';
knsgfsDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'knsgfsDic';
btlxDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'btlxDic';
lxDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'lxDic';
sendDocDic: select a.mc as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'sendDocDic';
sydlxDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'sydlxDic';
sendDocTypeDic: select FileTypeId as id ,FileTypeName as mc from B_OA_FileType WHERE ParentId =(select FileTypeId from B_OA_FileType WHERE flagType ='1');
sendDocTypeDic_ZhiDui: select FileTypeId as id ,FileTypeName as mc from B_OA_FileType WHERE ParentId =(select FileTypeId from B_OA_FileType WHERE flagType ='3');
receiveDocTypeDic: select FileTypeId as id ,FileTypeName as mc from B_OA_FileType WHERE ParentId =(select FileTypeId from B_OA_FileType WHERE flagType ='2');
travelStatus: select 1 travelStatus,'待审批' name union select 2 travelStatus,'出差中' name union select 3 travelStatus,'已结束' name;
leaveType: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'leaveType';
EIAExpertTypeDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'EIAExpertTypeDic';
DICT_ElementsValueType: select 1 EVTType,'国家标准' name union select 10 EVTType,'应急系统自定义' name;
Province: select csz AS Province,mc AS name FROM Para_BizTypeItem  WHERE flid = 79 AND sfqy = 1;
City: select csz AS City,mc AS name FROM Para_BizTypeItem  WHERE flid = 80 AND sfqy = 1;
Area: select csz AS jzdm,mc AS name FROM Para_BizTypeItem  WHERE flid = 78 AND sfqy = 1;
EnvironmentalPollution: select csz AS wrlb,mc AS name FROM Para_BizTypeItem  WHERE flid = 81 AND sfqy = 1;
emergencyLevelDic: select a.csz as id, a.mc as mc from Para_BizTypeItem a , Para_BizTypeDictionary b where a.flid = b.id and b.lx = 'emergencyLevelDic';
FX_WorkFlowCase_EndDateDic: select year(EndDate)  as id,year(EndDate)  as mc from FX_WorkFlowCase as a where a.isEnd =1 group by year(EndDate);
QuarterDic: select 1 id,1 mc UNION select 2 id ,2 mc UNION select 3 id ,3 mc UNION select 4 id ,4 mc ;
supervisionReminderDic: select year(createDate) as id,year(createDate) as mc from B_OA_SupervisionReminder GROUP BY year(createDate);
meetingRoomName: select  MeetingRoomID ,MeetingRoomName FROM B_OA_MeetingRoom WHERE Status = 0;
isEffectiveDic: select 0 id , '无效' name union select 1 id, '有效' name;
sourceTypeDic: select 0 id , '非业务' name union select 1 id , '业务' name
